tool.name: Merge Point Clouds
tool.description: This tool can be used to merge point clouds. The attribute fields of the merged point cloud resemble those of the first point cloud in the input list. In order to merge the attributes of the additional point cloud layers, these must be consistent (field name and type) with the first point cloud in the input list. Missing attribute values are set to no-data.

param.name: DEL_LAYERS
param.label: Delete Input
param.help: Removes input layers from memory while merging.

param.name: ADD_IDENTIFIER
param.label: Add Input Identifier
param.help: Adds a field with an identifier for the input point cloud a point originates from.

param.name: START_VALUE
param.label: Start Value
param.help: The start value to be used for the identifier.
